name: smartcombos.zh
author: Alucard648
info: A library for placing and operating with self-connecting combos.
description: This library contains functions for manipulating with Smart-Placing combos, like if Link constructs a piece of railroad track, all adjacent tracks connect automatically. Mostly used in path connection puzzles.Credit goes to Moosh for assistance with continious path routine.
setup: Set up combos, as shown in screen shot #1Import and compile the library.
